title: Triage X
alternative_title: トリアージX ; 急救识别X ; TriageX
status: トリアージX ; 急救识别X ; TriageX
description:
Description :
        At first glance, Arashi Mikami appears to be a normal, albeit socially awkward, 17 year old high school student. However, he's actually part of a secret vigilante organization known as Black Label, a group dedicated to executing power-hungry criminals the law refuses to deal with. Unfortunately, taking down a crime lord isn't always an easy task, and there are bound to be consequences for any action... This is the action-packed story of the trials of Arashi and the people close to him.

Other manga :
+ GTO Shonan 14 days
+ Ouran High School Host Club
